title: aDiDum muruganai
sahitya:
aaDiDum muruganai aararivaarO

aDiyaar manadinil asaindasaindu ODi



anupallavi



tEDiDuvOriDam paaDiDuvOriDam

naaDiDuvOriDam ODioLindu viLai

(aaDiDum)



caraNam



karppanaikaDangaa kadirvEl azhagan

narppadam tEDuvOr naaDum anbazhagan

poRpadam paaDuvOr pugazhum meyyazhagan

aRpan enakkirangi aRpudamaay kaNmun

(aaDiDum)
